itemDescription: British lawyer, horse racing trainer, and treasurer of the UK Independence Party

wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Stephen Reid (born 2 March 1954) is a British lawyer, horse racing trainer and former treasurer of the UK Independence Party.

link_mentions.page: List of people associated with University College London
response: * Andrew Reid (LLB), lawyer, horse racing trainer and current treasurer of the UK Independence Party
* Andrew Reid, lawyer, racehorse trainer and Treasurer of the UK Independence Party
